verses.verse: <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> made <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> until he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1129>building<s%> his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

Only the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> because there was no <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> until those <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3212>walking<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> only he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1931>there;<s%> for that was the <S%H1419>great<s%> high <S%H1116>place.<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on that <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

In <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7592>"Ask<s%> what I shall give <S%H5414>you.<s%>"

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have <S%H6213>shown<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> according as he <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you in <S%H571>truth,<s%> and in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and in <S%H3483>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%> with <S%H8104>you.<s%> You have kept for him this <S%H1419>great<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> that you have <S%H5414>given<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3068>Now,<s%> Yahweh my <S%H430>God,<s%> you have made your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> instead of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%> I am but a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child.<s%> I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know how to go <S%H3318>out<s%> or come <S%H935>in.<s%>

Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> that <S%H4487>can't<s%> be numbered nor <S%H5608>counted<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> therefore an <S%H8085>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> that I may <S%H995>discern<s%> between <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil;<s%> for who is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> this your <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%>"
The <S%H1697>speech<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H7592>asked<s%> this <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Because you have asked this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and have not <S%H7592>asked<s%> for yourself <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life,<s%> neither have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> for <S%H7592>yourself,<s%> nor have asked the <S%H5315>life<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> but have <S%H7592>asked<s%> for yourself <S%H995>understanding<s%> to <S%H8085>discern<s%> <S%H4941>justice;<s%>

<S%H6213>behold,<s%> I have done according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I have given you a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and an <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> so that there has been none like you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>you,<s%> neither after you shall any arise like <S%H6965>you.<s%>

I have also <S%H5414>given<s%> you that which you have not <S%H7592>asked,<s%> both <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> so that there shall not be <S%H376>any<s%> among the <S%H4428>kings<s%> like <S%H3117>you,<s%> all your days.

If you will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> as your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> then I will <S%H748>lengthen<s%> your <S%H3117>days.<s%>"

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3364>awoke;<s%> and <S%H2472>behold,<s%> it was a dream. Then he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and offered <S%H5927>up<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> <S%H6213>offered<s%> peace <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> to all his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
Then <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> who were <S%H2181>prostitutes<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I and this <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%> I delivered a <S%H3205>child<s%> with her in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

It happened the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> after I <S%H3205>delivered,<s%> that this <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3205>delivered<s%> <S%H3162>also.<s%> We were together. There was no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> with us in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2108>just<s%> us <S%H8147>two<s%> in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
This <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H1121>child<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> because she lay on <S%H7901>it.<s%>

She <S%H6965>arose<s%> at <S%H8432>midnight,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H519>me,<s%> while your handmaid <S%H3463>slept,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> it in her <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> her <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

When I <S%H6965>rose<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H3243>nurse<s%> my <S%H1121>child,<s%> <S%H4191>behold,<s%> it was dead; but when I had <S%H995>looked<s%> at it in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H1121>behold,<s%> it was not my son, whom I <S%H3205>bore.<s%>"

The <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2416>"No;<s%> but the living is my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> is your <S%H1121>son.<s%>" This <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4191>"No;<s%> but the dead is your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and the <S%H2416>living<s%> is my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" Thus they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H2063>one<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> 'This is my son who <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and your <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H4191>dead;<s%>' and the <S%H2063>other<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> 'No; but your son is the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H1121>one,<s%> and my son is the living <S%H2416>one.<s%>'"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Get<s%> me a <S%H2719>sword.<s%>" They <S%H3947>brought<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1504>"Divide<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> in <S%H8147>two,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> to the <S%H259>one,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> to the <S%H259>other.<s%>"

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> whose the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> was <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> for her <S%H7356>heart<s%> <S%H3648>yearned<s%> over her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> her the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3205>child,<s%> and in no <S%H4191>way<s%> <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H559>it!<s%>" But the other said, "It shall be neither mine nor <S%H1504>yours.<s%> Divide it."
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> her the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3205>child,<s%> and in no <S%H4191>way<s%> <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H517>it.<s%> She is its mother."

All <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H8199>judged;<s%> and they <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H4428>king:<s%> for they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was in <S%H7130>him,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
